subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN4105 is on the way
description_text:
Hi there,

I have just received this order however the plus x pedal control box is
missing.

Are you able to send it to me please?
I'm quite disappointed as I waited for a month for the package to arrive
and I am still unable to use it without the control box.

I have attached a photo of everything that has been sent.

Regards,

Chris

conversations.body_text: Hi CHJ,    We apologize for the inconvenience caused. We will immediately send you a replacement.

Hi,

Thank you for your quick response, I really appreciate it and look forward
to using your product in the future.

Regards,

Chris
Hi CHJ,    Here is your logistics tracking link.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=YT2535700705293301
